column3: With the people you trust you can be yourself. And you are VERY good at your job.
You love to be "Ruler Of The Land" but you really trust your friends and the people who trust you. And you LOVE mystery.
You are very smart and sneaky. You are a great listener and observer who wants to find out information.
You use your smart "gifts" for EVIL even though you can be very charming. You do have a GREAT taste in sweaters!!!
You are a very successful person even though you sometimes don't know how lucky you really are.
